description: Supply, delivery and installation of Panels to 11 – 279 Broadway St East Yorkton SK S3N 4B2 Canada.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Government Tender Notice for the Purchase of Furniture for Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) Facility in Yorkton, SK

### Notice Details:

| Category | Information |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation # | WS4520335739-Doc4541241423 |
| Publication Date | May 7, 2024 |
| Closing Date | June 6, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT |
| Expected Contract Start Date | July 31, 2024 |
| Expected Contract End Date | Ongoing (until required) |
| Status | Cancelled |
| Procurement Method | Competitive Open Tendering |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |

### Tender Details:

* A mandatory amendment was issued on May 29, 2024, updating the tendering process timeline.
* The original tender closing date is cancelled, and a revised deadline of [May 30, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT] is now in effect.
* Failure to submit the bid package by the revised closing date will result in the bid being deemed non-responsive.
* Ariba Discovery posting response and Canada Buys posting closing times are no longer applicable.
* The contract value shall be compensated in accordance with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) negotiated contract rates.
* Tender packaging and electronic Tendering are mandatory.
* CSI/NAICS Commodity Classification Code is 56100000 (Accommodation Furniture).

### Supplier Requirements and Evaluation Criteria:

* Authenticated Goods/Services Secondary Certificate of Origin and Bill of Lading.
*  Valid GSIN none.

### Important Contact Information:
 Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC) and the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
* Postal Code: None
* PSPC Representative: Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC), kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Resources:

* A complete copy of the tender package can be obtained by clicking the link in the "Notice URL" section.
* For any questions and concerns, please contact the PSPC representative listed below. 
Note: Any necessary bid submission documents should be submitted now by May 30, 2024, by 2:00 PM EDT at the latest. During this
